snippet: BlackRock said on Wednesday that its second-quarter profit fell 3 percent from the same time last year, but the world's biggest money management firm still beat analyst estimates as it grappled with global market turmoil.
abstract: BlackRock said on Wednesday that its second-quarter profit fell 3 percent from the same time last year, but the world's biggest money management firm still beat analyst estimates as it grappled with global market turmoil.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: BlackRock Earnings Slip 3%, but Exceed Forecasts
headline.print_headline: BlackRock Earnings Slip 3%, but Exceed Forecasts
